name: CVE-2016-0145
description: The font library in Microsoft Windows Vista SP2; Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1; Windows 7 SP1; Windows 8.1; Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2; Windows RT 8.1; Windows 10 Gold and 1511; Office 2007 SP3 and 2010 SP2; Word Viewer; .NET Framework 3.0 SP2, 3.5, and 3.5.1; Skype for Business 2016; Lync 2010; Lync 2010 Attendee; Lync 2013 SP1; and Live Meeting 2007 Console allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted embedded font, aka "Graphics Memory Corruption Vulnerability."
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:live_meeting:2007:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2012:r2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:lync:2010:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office:2007:sp3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:lync:2010:*:attendee:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1511:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:office:2010:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:.net_framework:3.5:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:.net_framework:3.0:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2012:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:skype_for_business:2016:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:.net_framework:3.5.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_rt_8.1:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_vista:*:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:lync:2013:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:word_viewer:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
